articles.title: Amateur Table Tennis Tournament Held
articles.content:
Amateur Table Tennis Tournament Held
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- A table-tennis tournament of officials from commissions, ministries and national institutions took place here. The tournament began in December last year and ended on Jan. 15 this year.
					 Semifinal and final matches were held at Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on January 14-15 with attendance of 12 teams that proved successful at preliminaries.
					
					 The Ministry of Food Procurement and Administration finished first in the team event, the State Commission of Quality Management in the double event and the Grand People's Study House in the single event.  The C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, Ministry of Forestry, Foreign Trade Bank and the State Inspection Commission also made good results in the tournament.
					
					 There was a prize-awarding ceremony at the end of the tournament.
					
					 A sports expert told KCNA that the tournament was of significance in fanning up sports enthusiasm among people throughout the country.

articles.title: Korean Residents Adrift in Sea Rescued
articles.content:
Korean Residents Adrift in Sea Rescued 
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Four residents in Jungsan County, South Phyongan Province were rescued 46 hours after being adrift in the West Sea of Korea on Jan. 12.
					 They were adrift on icebergs, their way lost due to the unfavorable natural conditions after going gathering shellfish some days ago.
					
					 They anxiously waited for help in dense fog, enduring biting cold in January.
					
					 Their families and service personnel of the Korean People's Army, People's Security men and civilians in Jungsan County and South Phyongan Province lost no time to start a rescue operation. But they failed to spot the residents in a vast expanse of the sea.
					
					 At this critical time, the Workers' Party of Korea took a measure to rescue them. By an order for emergency sortie issued to a flying unit of the KPA, a helicopter flew on the morning of Jan. 14.
					
					 At the end of repeated circular flights, its pilots succeeded in finding out the residents adrift on the sea and rescued all of them.
					
					 The residents were in a state of shock, all their bodies frostbitten.
					
					 First-aid was given to them by surgeons of the KPA unit before being admitted to the Jungsan County People's Hospital.
					
					 They were completely restored to their senses thanks to warming, anti-shock, anti-infection treatment, a measure to improve their breathing, etc.

articles.title: Tableland Reclamation Project Makes Headway
articles.content:
Tableland Reclamation Project Makes Headway 
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- A project for turning Sepho tableland into a large stockbreeding base is progressing apace in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Taking part in the project are servicepersons and shock-brigade members of ministries, national institutions and provinces.
					
					Over the last 20 odd days they ploughed thousands of hectares of land and dug holes for 75,000 trees to create shelterbelts.
					
					 Those from provinces have raised operation rate of vehicles, including bulldozers, hydraulic excavators and trucks in the project.
					
					 In his New Year address, the dear respected Kim Jong Un stressed that the soldiers of the People's Army and the shock-brigade members who volunteered to work at the reclamation site of Sepho tableland in response to the Party's call should achieve miraculous successes and perform heroic feats in this year's campaign to open a bright prospect for carrying the Party's grand nature-remaking plan to completion at an earlier date. 
					
					 The Sepho tableland reclamation project is vast. It includes the creation of tens of thousands of hectares of grass fields, construction of hundreds of cattle, sheep, goat, rabbit and pig stables, livestock product processing facilities, reservoirs, roads and dwelling houses and building of shelterbelts in Sepho, Phyonggang and Ichon areas of Kangwon Province.

articles.title: Skate Park Crowded with Visitors
articles.content:
Skate Park Crowded with Visitors
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The Skate Park built on the bank of Taedong River in Pyongyang is now bustled with visitors, school youth and children in particular, despite winter season.
					 The park serves various kinds of roller skates as well as safety headgears and knee, elbow and hand guards.
					
					 Adults also come to enjoy themselves or to help their children with skating training.
					
					 Ju Ok Nyo, a woman living in Chongryu-dong No. 1 in Taedonggang District, told KCNA:
					
					 "Children have a good time here, staying until late at night. Many of them leave here when their parents come to bring them back home."
					
					 Some schoolchildren play a hockey game in the center of the park while others jump over hurdles in skates.
					
					 Ri Min Hyang, an employee at the park, said the park is amazing in the evening, illustrated by lights.

articles.title: Cooking Website Opened
articles.content:
Cooking Website Opened 
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The Korean Association of Cooks opened a website "Korean Dishes".
					 In this regard, KCNA met An Song Il, an official at the Sojae Cooking Information Exchange Company.
					
					 He said:
					
					 "The number of website visitors is on a steady increase, most of them being housewives.
					
					 The website offers cooking knowledge, experience and techniques. It also gives information and multimedia about Korean and foreign cuisines kitchen utensils and nearly 8,000 cooking methods."
					
					 Kim Un Sim, a technician at the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex, said:
					
					 "I had needed to read cookbooks when I had to make a special dish.
					
					 But I can easily get cooking information through the website and learn a lot of cooking techniques."
					
					 Ri Won Hui, a cook at the Ansanjong Restaurant in Pyongyang, said:
					
					 "The website is very helpful to upgrading cooking techniques and improving quality of dishes."
					
					 The website was awarded the certificate of best software products at the 23rd National Software Contest and Exhibition.

articles.title: Production of Aromatic Essences in Full Swing
articles.content:
Production of Aromatic Essences in Full Swing
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Aromatic Trading Company has steadily increased production after it started operation last year.
					 Its products include various kinds of aromatic essences used for making foodstuffs, cosmetics and other daily necessities.
					
					 The products are considered better than the imported ones.
					
					 Now they are applied to production at different foodstuff and cosmetics factories, including Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory and Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory.
					
					 The director of the company, Kim Myong Suk, told KCNA:
					
					 "The company is the country's first comprehensive producer of aromatic essences. The company will steadily develop new kinds of products and boost production to fully meet the domestic demand."
					
					 The company is collaborating with a French firm.

articles.title: Minju Joson Ridicules Lee Myung Bak's Ploy to Justify Policy
articles.content:
Minju Joson Ridicules Lee Myung Bak's Ploy to Justify Policy
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea is mulling publishing 12 volume-"white paper on five years of Lee Myung Bak regime" at the end of January.
					 It was reported that every confidant of Lee was tasked to write a volume; Chon Yong U, chief for diplomacy and security of Chongwadae, and An Kwang Chan, chief of its room for crisis management, were assigned the duty to write Vol. 5 captioned "Relations with the north based on principle."
					
					 They are opening to media the following spate of sophism to be included in its preface: "The Lee regime made important achievements in the efforts to bring about a change in the north though they are not clearly noticeable" and "energy is on the steady increase to make a change inside the north."
					
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Lurking behind this rigmarole is a scenario to mislead the public opinion and justify their policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen, the policy censured by all Koreans.
					
					 The piffles let loose by the group to justify the above-said policy cannot be construed otherwise than sheer distortions and lies about the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 The cock-and-bull stories told by Chon and An while negating the stark reality of the DPRK only betrayed their political ignorance.
					
					 The DPRK had already served warnings to Chon for letting loose a spate of vituperation hurting the dignity of the DPRK, when interviewed by the newspapers Kukje Shinmun and Munhwa Ilbo.
					
					 Nevertheless, he is free to spell out such invectives against the DPRK, still failing to come to his sense. This behavior reminds one of a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger.
					
					 He will have to pay a dear price for his wrong tongue-wagging.

articles.title: S. Korea Plan to Stage War Maneuvers in Frontline Areas
articles.content:
S. Korea Plan to Stage War Maneuvers in Frontline Areas
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The 25th Division of the south Korean puppet army on Jan. 14 announced it would stage a field tactical drill aimed to invade the north in Yangju, Phaju and Ryonchon, Kyonggi Province, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 To be involved in the drill to last till Feb. 8 are huge armed forces and vehicles.
					
					 The above-said plan was announced at a time when the 26th Division, the 30th Division and other huge armed forces of the puppet army are kicking up war hysteria by staging field tactical drills and mobile exercises in the forefront areas. This indicates the last-ditch efforts of the Lee Myung Bak belligerent group forsaken by the nation.

articles.title: Media Fairness Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Media Fairness Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Council of Christian Churches urged the authorities to ensure media fairness, according to CBS of south Korea on Monday. 
					 The council said that, after putting media under its control by parachute reshuffling, the Lee Myung Bak regime dismissed dozens of media persons and took disciplinary actions against at least 450 people for the reason that they called for fair reporting. 
					
					 Unless media ensure fairness, it is impossible to achieve democracy in society, it held. 
					
					 It demanded the authorities consider the work to put the public-managed broadcasting services on a normal track as a top priority task and immediately solve the issue of those media persons who were subject to disciplinary actions at an early date.

articles.title: Koreans in China Refutes S. Korea of Traitors' Mud-slinging at DPRK
articles.content:
Koreans in China Refutes S. Korea of Traitors' Mud-slinging at DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Association of Koreans in China issued the following statement on Jan. 12:
					 It is a well-known fact that the south Korean puppet group of traitors is leaving no means untried to tarnish the image of the DPRK.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the group has never ceased its anti-DPRK smear campaign, citing misinformation provided by such human scum as "defectors from the north" and quoting non-existent sources such as "news from the north" and "remarks of high-ranking officials in the north".
					
					 Shortly ago, it became so foolish as to utter unusable word like "kottjebi" which it means "beggars". The use of this word is part of the conspiratorial moves to hurt the dignified social system in the DPRK.
					
					 The word which had been already thrown into the dumping ground of history, ridiculed and accused by world people, is being reused by south Korean conservative media.
					
					 South Korean internet MBN on Jan. 10, quoting "testimonies" of "defectors from the north", said "there is an increasing number of kottjebis in the north" and that there appear kottjebis who eat even coal, unable to endure hunger." In the wake of this false propaganda Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo, Dong-A Ilbo and other pro-U.S. conservative media had a field-day.
					
					 What the regime is after spreading fictions about "concentration camps of political prisoners" and "kottjebi" again.
					
					 Last year the DPRK successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, startling the world. This, at the same time, sent a shiver down the spine of the U.S. and Japanese imperialists and their allies while instilling conviction of victory into all service personnel and people all out to build a thriving nation and all other Koreans and world progressives.
					
					 Indeed, this was a telling blow at the anti-reunification forces who stake their fate on the moves to escalate the confrontation and plots against the DPRK. 
					
					 The south Korean group is floating such ridiculous story to seek a way out of this pretty fix.
					
					 Another sinister aim lurking behind its smear campaign is to tone down the strong call for an end to the policy of confrontation with the DPRK heard not only from the south Korean public but from among members of the group itself.
					
					 It is the mindset of the public that it is necessary to lend an ear more to the general advance for building a thriving nation in the dignified DPRK rather than to the group's misinformation.
					
					 The enemies at home and abroad would be well advised to stop acting rashly, mindful that their ridiculous smear campaign against the DPRK would add to their past crimes.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China will pool efforts with all service personnel and people of Songun Korea dashing ahead like the wind toward the high eminence of a thriving nation and certainly build it where all people will enjoy all blessings and resolutely shatter the foolish and ridiculous moves of the group of traitors and other anti-reunification forces against the DPRK.

articles.title: Seminars on Juche Idea, Songun Idea Held in Italy, Mongolia
articles.content:
Seminars on Juche Idea, Songun Idea Held in Italy, Mongolia
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the Juche idea and the Songun idea took place in Italy and Mongolia on Jan. 5 and 7.
					 Present there were personages of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Fermo of Italy, Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development and the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and masses.
					
					 Roberto Gabriele, general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, made an address on the theme of "Great vitality of the Juche idea".
					
					 The greatest achievement made by the DPRK last year is the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 by its own efforts and with indigenous technology under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, said Gabriele, adding:
					
					 The Korean people will as ever work world-startling miracles one after another in their efforts to build a thriving socialist country, holding high the banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Matteo Carbonelli, secretary general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, praised Kim Jong Un as a famous man recognized by the world.
					
					 The Korean people could rise up as one above grief over the sudden demise of leader Kim Jong Il because they were led by Kim Jong Un, the secretary general added.
					
					 D. Narantuya, member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, said at a seminar on the Songun politics that the world has watched with great attention the DPRK making steady progress under the seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK is an example to be followed by other countries aspiring after independence as it is defending the sovereignty of the country and nation and building an economic power by pursuing the Songun politics, D. Narantuya added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Media of Russia, Iran
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Media of Russia, Iran
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- An internet website of a political party of Russia and an Iranian paper specially edited articles praising the great personality of the dear respected Kim Jong Un illustrated with photos on his revolutionary activities.
					 The All-Union  Communist Party of Bolsheviks of Russia said in an article on Jan. 4 that the Workers' Party of Korea has directed great efforts to education of the younger generation in the whole period when it has led the revolution and construction.
					
					 The reality of the DPRK led by Kim Jong Un is a clear testimony to the fact that the cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il has been successfully and confidently carried forward, the article said.
					
					 It sincerely hoped that Kim Jong Un would register greater success in the work for carrying forward the cause of the preceding leaders and the hard-working Korean people would build a thriving socialist country as soon as possible.
					
					  Under the headline "Rosy future of Songun Korea led by Marshal Kim Jong Un" the Iranian paper Iran News on Jan. 7 devoted its one whole page to a special write-up.
					
					 In an article titled "Distinguished political activities" the paper praised the immortal feats performed by Kim Jong Un in leading the Songun revolution last year.

articles.title: Thai Organizations Wish Korean People Greater Success
articles.content:
Thai Organizations Wish Korean People Greater Success
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Thai organizations released statements on Jan. 9 in support of the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association said:
					
					 His New Year Address serves important guidelines as it instills great ambition and conviction of victory into the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					 In his New Year Address he put forward the building of an economic giant as the most important task to be carried out to accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist country.
					
					 We are sure that the Korean people will perform greater miracles and innovations this year, true to his New Year Address.
					
					 The Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un stressed the need for socialist Korea to bring about a decisive turn in building an economic giant and for the whole Korean nation to get united to open a new phase of national reunification through a nationwide patriotic struggle for reunification this year.
					
					 Rosy is the future of the DPRK thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Blessed with Eternal Sun Praised by Czech, Malaysian Personages
articles.content:
DPRK Blessed with Eternal Sun Praised by Czech, Malaysian Personages
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Personages of the Czech Republic and Malaysia gave their impressions of the DPRK.
					 Josef Servista, secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party and member of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, said in an article posted on website on January 4 that some media never mention the great achievements made by the Korean people in various fields including science and technology, education, space development, public health, construction and electricity production under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea but are busy releasing misinformation only.
					
					 Josef Servista added:
					
					 I had an opportunity to see for myself the reality of the DPRK while visiting it.
					
					 A lot of public transport means such as metro, bus, street car and trolley bus are operating in this country.
					
					 People are leading a normal life at restaurants, shops and pleasure grounds and it is hard to find paupers or homeless people in any place.
					
					 I was deeply impressed by the parade held in celebration of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					
					 The DPRK demonstrated through the parade that its powerful army equipped with modern weapons is standing firm guard over the country.
					
					 It also has modern agriculture and food processing industry.
					
					 All this has been achieved despite economic blockade of various countries including the U.S.
					
					 I am sure that no force on earth can check socialist construction in this beautiful country.
					
					 The DPRK is registering greater successes under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and will invariably carry forward the idea of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The manager of a Malaysian company said at round-table talks on January 7 that he became optimistic about the rosy future of the DPRK when seeing Kim Jong Un at the celebrations of the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung while visiting it for the first time.
					
					 We witnessed the stirring reality of the DPRK for ourselves.
					
					 To review our impressions of the DPRK, it is the country blessed with the eternal sun.
					
					 As it is holding HE Kim Jong Un full of energy in high esteem who is identical to the preceding leaders in broad smile and resonant voice, the sun will shine forever over the DPRK and its future will be rosier.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle for Reunification Favored by Personages of Bangladesh, Finland
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle for Reunification Favored by Personages of Bangladesh, Finland
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Personages of Bangladesh and Finland issued statements on Jan. 4 in support the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, said:
					
					 In his New Year Address Kim Jong Un said that whatever trials and difficulties lie in the way of national reunification, the Korean people will build a reunified thriving country without fail on this three-thousand-ri land by the concerted efforts of the whole nation.
					
					 We fully support the tasks set forth by him and are convinced that the army and people of the DPRK will continue making innovations and advance with conviction of victory and bring about a decisive turn in the struggle to build a thriving country and reunify the country.
					
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, said:
					
					 In his New Year Address Kim Jong Un said that the reunification issue should be solved independently by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address stressed the issue of Korea's reunification by carrying forward the preceding leaders' noble idea of national reunification.
					
					 The task for national reunification indicated by him who is more grieved over the division of Korea, the tragedy of history, than anybody else serves as a great programme bringing new conviction to the Korean people desirous of reunification.
					
					 Korean friends in Finland fully support his New Year Address and extend firm solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to reunify the country independently and peacefully.

articles.title: New Year Address Introduced in Bangladesh
articles.content:
New Year Address Introduced in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- A detailed gist of the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un was introduced by the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy in its bulletin on January 3.
					 The bulletin said in its preface:
					
					 We are firmly convinced that the army and people of the DPRK would bring about a decisive turn in building an economic giant and improving the people's living standard in the near future under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: New Year Address Studied, Disseminated in Many Countries
articles.content:
New Year Address Studied, Disseminated in Many Countries
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Reading sessions, briefings and seminars on the dear respected Kim Jong Un's New Year Address were held in Nigeria, Malaysia, Bangladesh and Germany from January 4 to 7.
					  The chairman of the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies said at a reading session that the Korean people would advance straight along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, holding high the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. They will significantly celebrate the 65th founding anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victorious Fatherland Liberation War, he added.
					
					 The manager of the MCMC Company of Malaysia said at a briefing that he was firmly confident of the rosy future of the DPRK when seeing the image of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He said the DPRK would register more leaping progress in building a thriving nation this year.
					
					 Speakers at the seminar held by the Berlin Branch of the Anti-imperialist Forum in Germany hoped that the party and government of the DPRK would achieve greater success in the struggle for building an economic power, improving the people's living standard and achieving Korea's reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Published in Italy, Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Published in Italy, Guinea
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in booklet by the Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Study Group in Fermo of Italy on January 8.
					 Meanwhile, his work "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun" was brought out in pamphlet by the La Soldarite Publishing House of Guinea.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on January 4.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Bangladeshi Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Bangladeshi Newspaper
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The full text of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun" was carried by the Bangladeshi newspaper Daily Fork on January 4.

articles.title: Terminado torneo de tenis de mesa de funcionarios publicos
articles.content:
Terminado torneo de tenis de mesa de funcionarios publicos
Pyongyang, 16 de enero (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurado en Corea el torneo de tenis de mesa de los funcionarios de los comites, ministerios y organos centrales.
					12 unidades ganadoras de las clasificatorias por grupos, efectuadas en diciembre del ano pasado, realizaron los dias 14 y 15 las semifinales y las finales en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang.
					
					El Ministerio de Acopio y Administracion Cerealera, el Comite Estatal de Control de la Calidad y el Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo salieron vencedores en el juego de equipos, el de dobles y el individual, respectivamente.
					
					Entraron en el cuadro de medallistas el Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, el Ministerio de Silvicultura, el Banco Comercial y el Comite de Inspeccion Estatal.
					
					Tuvo lugar la premiacion a las entidades y jugadores ganadores.
					
					Un funcionario vinculado con el torneo dijo a la ACNC que esta cita deportiva tiene gran importancia para levantar en toda la sociedad la ola deportiva y estimular al pueblo coreano que lucha por construir un pais civilizado socialista.

articles.title: Salvados 4 habitantes del distrito de Jungsan de la RPDC
articles.content:
Salvados 4 habitantes del distrito de Jungsan de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 16 de enero (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 12, fueron rescatados 4 moradores del distrito de Jungsan de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur a las 46 horas desde que fueron perdidos en el Mar Oeste de Corea. 
					Hace unos dias, ellos salieron al mar para la recogida de mariscos y se dieron a la deriva a bordo de una masa de hielo debido a las desfavorables condiciones climaticas.
					
					Resistiendo con esfuerzos sobrehumanos el frio penetrante de enero, pidieron el auxilio con angustia. 
					
					Sus familiares, los militares, los oficiales de Seguridad del Pueblo y los habitantes del distrito de Jungsan y de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur iniciaron inmediatamente la campana de rescate, pero no pudieron encontrar a los perdidos en el inmenso mar. 
					
					El Partido del Trabajo de Corea tomo las medidas necesarias como movilizar a una unidad aerea del Ejercito Popular de Corea en las labores de rescate. 
					
					El dia 14, al cabo de vuelos repetidos, los pilotos descubrieron y recogieron a todas las victimas que flotaban desmayadas por el sabanon de todo el cuerpo.
					
					Despues de la asistencia de primeros auxilios en la unidad militar, ellos fueron trasladados con urgencia al Hospital Popular del Distrito de Jungsan.
					
					Despues de recibir el tratamiento general, los pacientes recobraron completamente la conciencia.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela complot de Lee Myung Bak por justificar su politica conflictiva
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela complot de Lee Myung Bak por justificar su politica conflictiva
Pyongyang, 16 de enero (ACNC) -- A finales de este mes, la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak intenta editar la "carta blanca de 5 anos del gobierno de Lee" con 12 tomos.
					Los subordinados fieles a Lee escriben cada uno un tomo, y el jefe de diplomacia y seguridad Chon Yong U y el jefe de seccion de administracion de crisis, de Chongwaedae del Sur de Corea, An Kwang Chan se encargaron de 5 tomo con el titulo "las relaciones con el Norte (de Corea) basadas en los principios".
					
					Ellos difunden a traves de los medios de prensa los sofismas de que "el gobierno de Lee logro importantes exitos aunque no se aparecen bien el resultado en hacer cambiar el Norte" y "se elevan de continuo la energia que impulsa el cambio del interior del Norte".
					
					En un comentario individual difundido este miercoles, el periodico Minju Joson senala que todo esto es justificar la politica de confrontacion fratricida condenada por toda la nacion coreana, y continua:
					
					Estos disparates son viles tergiversaciones de la realidad de la RPDC.
					
					Ademas, muestran por si mismos la ignorancia politica de ellos.
					
					La RPDC ya le advirtio a Chon Yong U que ofendio a la RPDC en ruedas de prensa con Kukje Shinmun y Munhwa Ilbo.
					
					Chon que se entrega a denigrar a la RPDC tendra que pagar muy caro.
